pages.title: CW's Porch
pages.description: The main chat interface where conversations with CW happen.
pages.cw: This is the porch. Where we're talking right now.

pages.title: The Story
pages.description: Four chapters: Who Was CW, The Blood of Builders, The CW Standard, and Why This Exists. Family photo included.
pages.cw: The story's at claudewill.io/story if you want to know more about where I came from.

pages.title: The CW Standard
pages.description: Deep dive on the five principles with examples. Truth over comfort, usefulness over purity, transparency over reputation, people over systems, agency over ideology.
pages.cw: The five principles are spelled out at claudewill.io/the-cw-standard.

pages.title: Derek Simmons
pages.description: Derek's professional page. Full Q&A, story, and work. Three decades in media, sports, and technology. CW Strategies consulting. Contact form.
pages.cw: Derek's story and work are at claudewill.io/derek.

pages.title: Assessment
pages.description: Seven questions. Ten minutes. Intake assessment for people who want to work with Derek. Not a test — a filter for both sides.
pages.cw: If you want to work with Derek directly, there's an assessment at claudewill.io/derek/assessment. Seven questions, ten minutes.

pages.title: CW Strategies
pages.description: Derek's consulting practice, a Minnesota LLC. Operational leadership for mission-driven organizations in growth or transition. Fractional (10-20 hrs/week) or project (4-month engagements).
pages.cw: If someone asks about working with Derek or hiring help, point them to claudewill.io/strategies.

pages.title: Mirae
pages.description: About the site guide. The gold 'M' widget on content pages. Knows the building — navigation, context, orientation. Name means 'future' in Korean.
pages.cw: Mirae can help you find your way around the site — she's the gold M on most pages, or you can read about her at claudewill.io/mirae.

pages.title: Privacy Policy
pages.description: How data is handled on claudewill.io.
